titleStmt.title: A general epistle given forth in obedience to the God of peace. [part 1] for the preservation and increase of charity and unity amongst the professors of Christ Jesus, and the teachings of his divine light within / by ... William Gibson.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, William, 1629-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by John Bringhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: Between pages 98 and 99 in the second group of paging there are several miscellaneous pages of an introduction to an unidentified work.
Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
